files.description: Centralized path-resolution utilities that define OUTPUT_DIR (defaulting to ./outputs/) and provide helpers to build output file paths consistently across the codebase.
Test that scans the repository to fail if any Python code references an absolute '/outputs' path instead of using the centralized OUTPUT_DIR resolver.
